definitions: a person who performs, dances to, or enjoys rock music, especially of a particular type
shortDefinitions: person who performs, dances to, or enjoys rock music

examples.text: the collection kick-starts with a great rocker, Wired All Night

definitions: a rocking device forming part of a mechanism, especially one for controlling the positions of brushes in a generator.
shortDefinitions: rocking device forming part of mechanism

definitions: a curved bar or similar support on which something such as a chair or cradle can rock.
shortDefinitions: curved bar or similar support on which something such as chair or cradle can rock

examples.text: he sat in his rocker and went to sleep

definitions: the amount of curvature in the longitudinal contour of a boat or surfboard

examples.text: the hull lines are classic with considerable rocker

shortDefinitions: amount of curvature in longitudinal contour of boat or surfboard

definitions: any of the curved stripes below the chevron of a noncommissioned officer above the rank of sergeant.
shortDefinitions: any of curved stripes below chevron of noncommissioned officer above rank of sergeant

definitions: the curved strip above the chevron of a chief petty officer.
shortDefinitions: curved strip above chevron of chief petty officer
